description: The relationship between teachers and the education department "must be repaired", a report says.
title: 'Cracked relationship' led to Manx teacher pay dispute
title_page: 'Cracked relationship' led to Manx teacher pay dispute - BBC News
maintext: It recommended the creation of a Manx Education Board, which would report to the education minister but be separate to their department, and proposed that head teachers be accountable to school governors.
